New Records: Netherlands made history by defeating South Africa for the first time across any format in the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2022-23
Key Match Events: Heinrich Klaasen's dismissal was a turning point in the match as South Africa lost a winnable position
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa lost wickets at crucial times and struggled with the Netherlands' fielding and catching
Netherlands used the dimensions of the field effectively
Post-Match Reflections: Netherlands' win ensures India's place in the semi-finals
South Africa's loss ends their World Cup campaign
The result means Pakistan vs Bangladesh will be a knockout match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was significant as it opened the door for Bangladesh to potentially qualify for the semi-finals
The game was marked by tight bowling and crucial fielding
